00006 #pragma once

00009 #include "linalg3d.h"
00010 #include "boost/lexical_cast.hpp"
00011 #include "iges.h"

00013 
00014 using namespace std;
00015 typedef void * NULL_t;
00016 // I don't need an empty
00017 
00018 /*
00019 Works:
00020   StepVariant v1=22.0;
00021   StepVariant v2=34.0;
00022   double d =  v1.get<double>() +  v2.get<double>(); 
00023   OutputDebugString(StrFormat(_T("Answer = %f\n"), d));
00024 Doesn't Work:
00025   StepVariant v1=22.0;
00026   StepVariant v2=34;
00027   double d =  v1.get<double>() +  v2.get<double>(); 
00028   OutputDebugString(StrFormat(_T("Answer = %f\n"), d));
00029 
00030 */
00031 class StepVariant 
00032 {
00033 public:
00034 //  bool _b;
00035   long _l;
00036   double _d;
00037   tstring _s;
00038   Vector _v;
00039   Matrix _m;
00040   Iges::CompositeCurve _curve;
00041 
00042   tstring _type;
00043   void Init() { _d=0.0; _l=0;  }
00044 
00045   StepVariant() { Init(); _type= _T("null"); } 
00046     StepVariant( bool b ) : _l( long(b)), _d(0)   { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( long ).name());} 
00047     StepVariant( int i ) : _l(i), _d(0)       { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( long ).name());} 
00048     StepVariant( long l ) : _l(l), _d(0)      { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( long ).name());} 
00049     StepVariant( float f ) : _d(f), _l(0)     { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( double ).name());} 
00050     StepVariant( double d ) : _d(d), _l(0)      { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( double ).name());} 
00051     StepVariant( Vector v ) : _v(v), _d(0), _l(0) { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( Vector ).name());} 
00052     StepVariant( Matrix m ) : _m(m), _d(0), _l(0) { USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( Matrix ).name());} 
00053     StepVariant( Iges::CompositeCurve c ) : _curve(c), _d(0), _l(0) 
00054   {USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( Iges::CompositeCurve ).name());} 
00055 #ifdef UNICODE
00056     StepVariant( const wchar_t *s ) : _s(s), _d(0), _l(0){ USES_CONVERSION; _type= A2T(typeid( tstring ).name()) ;}
00057 #else
00058     StepVariant( const char  *s )   : _s(s), _d(0), _l(0){ _type= typeid( tstring ).name() ;} 
00059 
00060 #endif
00061     StepVariant( const tstring &s ) : _s( s ), _d(0), _l(0) {USES_CONVERSION;  _type= A2T(typeid( tstring ).name()) ;  } 
00062 
00063   const tstring & type() const 
00064   { 
00065     return _type ; 
00066   } 
00067   template< typename T >
00068   bool IsType() const 
00069   {
00070     USES_CONVERSION;
00071     if(A2T(typeid( T ).name()) == _type)
00072      return true;
00073     return false;
00074   }
00075 
00076   template< typename T >
00077   T get() const 
00078   {
00079     if(typeid( T ).name() == typeid(CString ).name())
00080       DebugBreak();
00081     if(IsType<tstring>())
00082       return *(T *) &_s;
00083     else if(IsType<long>())
00084       return *(T *)&_l;
00085     else if(IsType<double>())
00086       return *(T *)&_d;
00087     else  if(IsType<Vector>())
00088       return *(T *)&_v;
00089     else  if(IsType<Matrix>())
00090       return *(T *)&_m;
00091     else  if(IsType<Iges::CompositeCurve>())
00092       return *(T *)&_curve;
00093     throw std::exception("bad stepvariant get");
00094 
00095   }
00096   template<>
00097   double get<double>() const 
00098   {
00099     if(IsType<long>() )
00100       return  (double) _l;
00101     if(IsType<tstring>() )
00102       return  (double) _tstof (_s.c_str());
00103     return _d;
00104   }
00105   template< >
00106   long get<long>() const 
00107   {
00108     if(IsType<tstring>()) 
00109       return _tcstol( get<tstring>().c_str(), NULL, 10 );
00110     if(IsType<double>() )
00111       return (long )_d;
00112     return _l;
00113   }
00114   template<>
00115   Vector get<Vector>() const 
00116   {
00117     if(IsType<tstring>() )
00118     {
00119       CString tmp = (LPCTSTR) get<tstring>( ).c_str();
00120       return Vector(DVal(tmp,0,","), DVal(tmp,1,","), DVal(tmp,2,","));
00121     }
00122     if(IsType<Vector>() )
00123       return _v;
00124 
00125     return Vector();
00126   }
00127 
00128 
00129   tstring ToString()
00130   {
00131     if(IsType<double>())  return boost::lexical_cast<tstring>( get<double>() );
00132     if(IsType<long>())    return boost::lexical_cast<tstring>( get<long>() );
00133     if(IsType<Vector>())    return (LPCTSTR) get<Vector>().ToString(); 
00134     if(IsType<Matrix>())    return (LPCTSTR) get<Matrix>().ToString(); 
00135     if(IsType<Iges::CompositeCurve>())    return _T(""); 
00136     return this->get<tstring>();
00137 
00138   }
00139 
00140   // or should bool make a double on constructor...
00141     bool operator !=( const StepVariant &v ) const { return !( *this == v ); }
00142   bool operator ==( const StepVariant &v ) const
00143   { 
00144     if(this->IsType<tstring>() && v.IsType<tstring>())
00145       return this->get<tstring>()==v.get<tstring>();
00146     if(this->IsType<Vector>() && v.IsType<Vector>())
00147       return this->get<Vector>() == v.get<Vector>();
00148     // turn into double and test
00149     return this->get<double>()==v.get<double>();
00150   }
00151   bool operator <( const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00152   { 
00153     if(this->IsType<tstring>() && v2.IsType<tstring>())
00154       return this->get<tstring>()<v2.get<tstring>();
00155     return this->get<double>()<v2.get<double>();
00156   }
00157   bool operator <=( const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00158   { 
00159     if(this->IsType<tstring>() && v2.IsType<tstring>())
00160       return this->get<tstring>()<=v2.get<tstring>();
00161     return this->get<double>()<=v2.get<double>();
00162   }
00163   bool operator &&( const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00164   { 
00165     return this->get<double>() && v2.get<double>();
00166 
00167   }
00168   bool operator ||( const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00169   { 
00170     return this->get<double>() || v2.get<double>();
00171 
00172   }
00173   bool operator >( const StepVariant &v2 ) const {  
00174     return !( *this <=v2 );   }
00175   bool operator >=( const StepVariant &v2 ) const { return !( *this < v2 );   }
00176 
00177   StepVariant operator +(  const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00178   { 
00179     if(this->IsType<tstring>() && v2.IsType<tstring>())
00180       return this->get<tstring>()+v2.get<tstring>();
00181     if(this->IsType<Vector>() && v2.IsType<Vector>())
00182       return  this->get<Vector>() +  v2.get<Vector>();
00183 
00184     double d1= get<double>();
00185     double d2 =v2.get<double>();  
00186     return  d1+d2;
00187   }
00188   StepVariant operator -(  const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00189   { 
00190     if(this->IsType<Vector>() && v2.IsType<Vector>())
00191       return  this->get<Vector>() -  v2.get<Vector>();
00192 
00193     // fixme: need better conversion 
00194     double d1= get<double>();
00195     double d2 =v2.get<double>();  
00196     return  d1-d2;
00197   }
00198   StepVariant operator *(  const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00199   { 
00200     if(this->IsType<Vector>() && v2.IsType<double>())
00201       return  this->get<Vector>()*  v2.get<double>();
00202     double d1 = get<double>();
00203     double d2 = v2.get<double>();   
00204     return  d1*d2;
00205   }
00206   StepVariant operator /(  const StepVariant &v2 ) const 
00207   { 
00208     if(this->IsType<Vector>() && v2.IsType<double>())
00209       return this->get<Vector>() /  v2.get<double>();
00210     double d1 = get<double>();
00211     double d2 = v2.get<double>();   
00212     return  d1/d2;
00213   }
00214 //  void StepVariant::Tests();
00215 
00216 };
00217 typedef StepVariant Variant;
